EmailTemplate.description: ADGR email for exceeded sub date
EmailTemplate.name: ADGR email for exceeded sub date
EmailTemplate.subject: Discontinue in Good Standing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sent on behalf of the Academic Director, Graduate Research
DISTRIBUTION: Associate Deans Graduate Research
CC: Graduate Research Managers
SUBJECT: Discontinue in Good Standing
Dear XYZ,
I am writing to advise that the following student/s enrolment has expired:
· SURNAME, GN (ID ########)
· SURNAME, GN (ID ########)
MGE have made at least two attempts to notify this/these student/s of their upcoming thesis submission date. The Graduate Coordinator and supervisor were also notified of the status of this/these student/s on DATE.
To date, no action has been taken by the student to submit their thesis or apply for an extension to their thesis submission date.
This/These student/s will now be discontinued in good standing.
Kind regards,
Professor Sharon Ricardo
Academic Director Graduate Research
